hero.title: Tego Business Graph
hero.tagline: Build unified business cognition for AI agents, enabling enterprise tasks to progress automatically like high-performing teams

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Shenzhen Zhama Future Technology Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "we") is committed to protecting your personal privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information.
introduction.content2: By using our services, you agree to the terms of this privacy policy. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.content: We may collect the following types of information:

items.title: Personal Identity Information:
items.content: name, email address, phone number, etc.

items.title: Technical Information:
items.content: IP address, browser type, device information, access time, etc.

items.title: Usage Data:
items.content: how you use our services, including pages and features accessed

collection.usageIntro: We use the collected information for:
usageItems: Analyzing usage patterns to improve user experience

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information in the following circumstances:

items.title: Service Providers:
items.content: with trusted third parties who help us operate our business

items.title: Legal Requirements:
items.content: when required by law or to protect our rights

items.title: Business Transfers:
items.content: in the event of a merger, acquisition, or asset sale

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, disclosure, modification, or destruction. However, please note that no system is 100% secure.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We will only retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected.
retention.content2: When your information is no longer needed, we will securely delete or anonymize it.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Under applicable data protection laws, you may have the following rights:
items: Access information we hold about you
Request deletion of your personal information
Object to processing of your information

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and know that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and significant changes will be notified to you via email or service notifications.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, please contact us through:
items: Address: Shenzhen Science and Technology Park, Nanshan District
contact.response: We will endeavor to respond to your inquiry within 30 days.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: Welcome to Tego OS platform. By accessing and using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
acceptance.content2: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Your continued use of the service will be deemed acceptance of the modified terms.

service.title: Service Description
service.content: Tego OS is an enterprise-grade multi-agent autonomous collaboration platform that provides the following services:
service.modification: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or terminate any services at any time without prior notice.

account.title: User Accounts
account.content: To use certain services, you need to create an account. You agree to:
promises: Provide accurate and complete registration information
Maintain the accuracy of account information
Protect the security of your account password
Take responsibility for all activities under your account
restrictionItems: Violate any applicable laws or regulations

conduct.title: User Conduct Guidelines
conduct.content: When using our services, you may not engage in the following activities:
prohibited: Infringe on others' intellectual property rights
Interfere with or disrupt the normal operation of services
Attempt unauthorized access to systems or data

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.content: All content in the service, including but not limited to text, graphics, interfaces, and code, is protected by intellectual property laws.
ip.userContent: You retain ownership of uploaded content but grant us a license to use, modify, and display such content.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Our services are provided "as is" without any express or implied warranties. We do not guarantee that the services will:
reasons: Be fully compatible with third-party services
Be completely secure or free from unauthorized access

changes.title: Terms Changes
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Significant changes will be notified to you via email or service notifications. Continued use of the service indicates acceptance of the modified terms.

disputes.title: Dispute Resolution
disputes.content: Any disputes arising from the use of this service should be resolved through friendly consultation. If consultation fails, they should be submitted to a court with jurisdiction.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us through the following methods:
methods: Address: Shenzhen Science and Technology Park, Nanshan District

aboutSection.title: Tego Core Value
aboutSection.subtitle: Enable AI agents to collaborate like high-performing teams based on unified business cognition
aboutSection.description: Abstract enterprise people, processes, rules, data and goals into comprehensible, inferable, and executable business semantic networks. Multi-agents are not running chaotically, but working in coordination under the same business cognitive graph, understanding each other and jointly advancing goals

vision.title: Tego vs Other Platforms - Differentiation
paragraphs: Unified Cognition: Build enterprise business semantic networks, AI agents collaborate based on unified cognition, not working in isolation
Cognition-Driven: Agents don't randomly invoke tools, but are constrained and guided by business cognition, ensuring controllable behavior
Continuous Evolution: Business memory and experience accumulation, system understands why decisions are made, providing enterprise-grade traceable intelligence

features.title: LAMP Intelligent Collaboration Framework
features.description: Think-Speak-Decide three-stage reasoning pipeline from latest academic research, simulating human team collaboration for deep agent cooperation and intelligent decision-making

features.title: DAG Concurrent Scheduling Engine
features.description: Directed Acyclic Graph-based task scheduling technology, automatically identifying task dependencies, maximizing parallelism, achieving 2-5x efficiency improvement

features.title: Experience Pool Continuous Learning
features.description: Vector storage of historical successful experiences, intelligent retrieval and reuse of successful strategies, reducing new task planning time by 40-60%

features.title: A2A Open Protocol
features.description: Support Agent2Agent open protocol for seamless integration with third-party agents, building an open enterprise AI ecosystem

footer.suffix: , enabling AI agents to collaborate like high-performing teams.

typingPhrases: Enable AI Agents to Collaborate Like High-Performing Teams
Understand Intent · Decompose Tasks · Coordinate Resources · Deliver Results
Unified Management · Intelligent Collaboration · Continuous Evolution

featuresSection.title: Five-Layer Cognitive Architecture
featuresSection.subtitle: From business entities to intelligent actions, building unified cognitive infrastructure for enterprise AI

collection.title: Business Entities · Cognitive Objects
collection.description: Abstract enterprise business world into AI-understandable entity objects: Organizations (departments, roles, positions), Business Objects (customers, contracts, orders, projects), Resources (budget, systems, inventory), Goals (KPIs, OKRs, milestones). AI no longer just 'reads fields', but truly understands business objects.

analysis.title: Business Relations · Cognitive Network
analysis.description: Build semantic relationship networks between business entities: Responsibility relations (who is responsible for whom), Constraint relations (which rules restrict behavior), Flow relations (task/status/approval), Dependency relations (prerequisites/follow-ups). This is the cognitive foundation for AI to 'collaborate like humans'.

organization.title: Rules & Policies · Tacit Knowledge Explicit
organization.description: Transform enterprise tacit knowledge into executable business rules: Approval policies, risk control rules, compliance requirements, exception handling strategies. Not hardcoded workflows, but intelligent decision rules of 'under what conditions, what actions should be taken'.

gateway.title: Action Mapping · From Cognition to Action
gateway.description: Map business concepts to Agent-executable actions. Each business entity (e.g., contract) is linked to specific operations (create, validate, risk analysis, approval advancement, archival). Agents don't randomly invoke tools, but are guided and constrained by business cognition.

taskManagement.title: Business State & Memory Layer
taskManagement.description: Record current progress, occurred exceptions, and decision rationales. Provides enterprise-grade traceable intelligence - the 'peace of mind' for enterprises.

habitTracking.title: Cognition-Driven Collaboration
habitTracking.description: Multi-agents are not running chaotically, but working under the same business cognitive graph with clear division of labor. Every agent behavior has cognitive basis, making it explainable, auditable, and optimizable.

financeManagement.title: Closed Loop from Cognition to Action
financeManagement.description: Business concepts map to executable actions, execution results update business state, state changes trigger new cognitive reasoning, forming a continuously optimizing intelligent loop.

footer.companyDescription: Tego Business Graph · Enable AI Agents to Collaborate Like High-Performing Teams

professional.description: Covers travel requests, approvals, flight/hotel booking, scheduling, and expense estimation—2-3 hours of coordination work completed automatically in 5 minutes

personal.title: Project Kickoff Process
personal.description: Automatically completes project space creation, resource allocation, environment setup, notifications, and scheduling—project kickoff reduced from 1-2 days to 30 minutes

enterprise.title: Intelligent Customer Service
enterprise.description: Ticket creation, customer contact, issue diagnosis, intelligent decision (exchange/repair/refund), satisfaction follow-up—response time reduced from hours to minutes

framework.title: Self-developed MCP Framework
framework.description: Based on proprietary MCP framework, using @Tool decorators to quickly define agent tools, significantly improving development efficiency.

standardization.title: Standardized Tool Registration & Auto Validation
standardization.description: Support automatic metadata declaration and structured registration of tool capabilities, automatic parameter validation and type checking.

simplification.title: Define Intelligent Services in Few Lines
simplification.description: Minimal development process, define an invocable intelligent service with just a few lines of code, rapid deployment and iteration.

multiAgent.title: Multi-Agent Collaboration (LAMP Framework)
multiAgent.description: Patented Technology: Language-enhanced multi-agent collaborative decision system featuring Think-Speak-Decide three-stage reasoning pipeline. Enables semantic communication between agents, continuous reasoning analysis, and multi-source information fusion for intelligent decisions. Supports DAG concurrent scheduling and dynamic replanning, achieving 15-25% improvement in task success rate and 2-5x performance boost.

summary.title: Core Advantages Summary
summary.content: Decorator-driven development model allows developers to focus on business logic without worrying about tedious details like tool registration and validation. Declarative development approach greatly improves development efficiency and code maintainability, reducing technical barriers and delivery costs.

tegoOS.title: Tego Business Graph
tegoOS.subtitle: Enable AI Agents to Collaborate Like High-Performing Teams, Autonomously Completing Complex Business Tasks

problem.title: Core Challenges Enterprises Face
problem.description: Agent silos, fragmented capabilities, lack of governance, efficiency bottlenecks—data isolated between different AI tools, single agents unable to handle cross-domain multi-step complex tasks, lacking enterprise-grade permission systems and audit mechanisms, sequential task execution requiring manual coordination.

mission.title: Tego OS Solution
mission.description: A unified multi-agent orchestration and management platform: providing natural language interaction interface for users to describe tasks in everyday language; connecting various specialized agents to coordinate their collaborative completion of tasks; built on cutting-edge AI research intelligent collaboration framework for true 'team-style' collaboration.

technologies.title: Four Core Capabilities
technologies.subtitle: End-to-end intelligent collaboration from understanding intent to closed-loop delivery

features: Dependency analysis and execution plan generation

orchestration.title: Concurrent Intelligent Scheduling

features: Dynamic concurrency adjustment and anomaly isolation

features: Multi-source information fusion for collaborative decision-making

feedbackLoop.title: Continuous Learning & Optimization
feedbackLoop.description: System with continuous learning capability, getting smarter over time
features: Successful trajectories auto-stored in experience pool
Failed cases as counter-examples to avoid repeating mistakes
New tasks retrieve similar experiences to reuse successful strategies
